description: Try our easy to follow Turkey & Lentil Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Turkey & Lentil Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420 g can lentils no added salt

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange lettuce, beetroot slices and tomato slices onto bread roll bases. Top with patty and sweet chilli sauce. Place bread roll top over filling and serve immediately.
